name: Mental Health Services
description: AFS provides family-centered and community-based services designed to meet the mental health needs of children, teens, and families involved with foster care, adoptions, and juvenile probation. AFS collaborates with biological and foster parents, child welfare workers, foster care support staff, schools, and community providers to ensure quality healthcare services when addressing the mental health needs of children, youth, and families.
